articles.description: China has launched a test model of a next-generation Chinese crew capsule which lifted off Tuesday on top of a heavy-lift Long March 5B rocket, marking a milestone in the future of Chinese space exploration ambitions.
articles.content:
The rocket was launched from Hainan Island and did not have any astronauts on board, according to Chinese state media.
